extensionDescription.message: Athraíonn sé sleamhnán toirt réamhshocraithe YouTube le ceann níos leithne chun rialú toirt níos éasca a dhéanamh.

sliderWidthLabel.description: Label used in the popup to adjust the width of the slider.

responsiveWidthLabel.message: Uirlis uathoibríoch le haghaidh leithead sleamhnáin:
responsiveWidthLabel.description: Label used in the popup to enable or disable automatic adjustment of the slider width.
